entries.text: #0Talk-1st time
Are you a traveller?
I am Chloanne, an orestone trader.
I travel about collecting rare stones, which I sell to make my living.
I never planned to visit this gods-forsaken place.
But I don't know... I just sort of ended up here.
I must've just wandered in...Heh...
But, now that I'm here, I've been scouting around for rare bits.
Oh, don't look at me like that!
Many of these stones are quite useful. For instance, certain stones are used in smithing.
Ahh, now your ears prick up! Heh.
I've extras, if you can pay. This is my trade, after all!
#0Talk-2nd time
What? Do you need something?
#0Talk-3rd time
I'll provide whatever service you need. For a fair price, of course!
#0Talk-After resting at a Bonfire
You've been long away. What would you like?
Well, I've only one thing to provide, and we both know what that is! Heh heh...
#0Menu-Choose "Talk" 1st time
I came here in search of rare stones, but...
The place is nothing like I was told. All this poison, and you can't get very far inside.
Don't just go haplessly wandering about.
#0Menu-Choose "Talk" 2nd time
These stones may look all the same. but to the trained eye, each is unique.
Some of them are used to smith weapons and armour, and some unique stones provide special benefits.
Some of them are extremely rare, and should be used with great thrift.
None of the differences are easily spotted, but I've learned quite a lot, really! Heh.
#0Menu-Choose "Talk" 3rd time
Drangleic...
How is it that I ended up here?
It's funny... I can't seem to remember.
#0Menu-Choose "Talk" 4th time
I've searched every nook and cranny here. I suppose it's time to move on.
Perhaps we'll meet again, if we live that long! Heh.
#0Menu-Choose "Leave" after exhausting her dialogue
I suppose it's about time I moved shop...
#0Talk-1st time
Oh, fancy meeting you here.
Speak up if you need anything at all. Alright?
#0Menu-Choose "Talk" 1st time
You know how they call this place Drangleic, right?
Well, in the old lore, in stories and the like, they said it had another name...
What was it? Well... I don't know, it's just something I heard.
Since long, long ago, many kingdoms have risen and fallen on this very spot.
Each like a great flame, that turns to soot.
Maybe that's why people don't remember much about the past...
#0Menu-Choose "Talk" 2nd time if Lenigrast is alive
You see that blacksmith over there?
Is he one of those...Hollows? He seems to keep eyeing me up.
He sort of looks like my father. He's a blacksmith, too, you see.
The poor man's such a worrywort.
But...he wouldn't follow me out here, would he?
#0Menu-Choose "Talk" 3rd time
I was born in a land to the west, Volgen. Famous for its merchants.
There were great, bustling cities.
But for me, they were suffocating.
And so I set out, in search of stones in faraway lands.
There are dangers, for certain, but I much prefer to live this way.
But...for the life of me, I can't remember how I ended up here...
It's as if...I were drawn to the place... or lured in...Oh, I don't know...
#0Menu-Choose "Talk" after spending 20000 souls
Oh, I know! Take these.
We can all do with a little help, can't we? I know I always can! Heh heh...
#0Menu-Choose "Leave" without purchasing something
No interest? Suit yourself.
#0Menu-Choose "Leave" after purchasing something
Visit me again, whenever you please.
#0After leaving abruptly
Oi! Mind your manners!
#0Upon being attacked-1st time
What?!
#0Upon being attacked-2nd time
What on earth?!
#0Upon being attacked-3rd time
Stop that!
#0Upon being attacked & made hostile
Fine, if that's the way it is...
##I'll trade stones for souls if you wish.
##If you've no souls, I'll trade for items.
##If you offer something of quality, I'll offer a comparable stone.
##Don't look so surprised, I always deal fair and square! Heh.
##Bye for now. Heh heh...
##(No caption) Don't just stand there, let me out of this thing!
##(No caption) Would you give me a hand?
##(No caption) Hey! You there!
##(No caption) Don't play deaf!
##(No caption) Oh... what a scare!
##(No caption) So sorry, and thanks.
##(No caption) Of all my luck...
##(No caption) Oh, you! Sorry for the trouble.
##You're… all right? I never expected a wonderer like you were still around.
##I'm Croana, a craftsman that repair bags and belts.
##You do have some too, don't you? I could give it a tweak so that it will be easier for you to use.
##Oh, do you still have something?
##You again. Nice, what is it?
##Welcome. Bag? Belt? Whichever you like.
##I was waiting for you. Bags? Or is it the belts that you want.
##Stay sane again when you come back.
##Oh、don't you need anything?
##We are friends now, so come see me at Madula some times.
##How's this?
##Do you understand the usage of the bag and belt?
##You store the things you want to carry in the bag and the things you want to use right away in the belt.
##If you can't use these to properly, then you will be doomed soon, ok?
##You can use the items in the belt right away, but it sometimes obstructs your move.
##You know the story of Cuindney the thief? The story he was caught because he put too much items in his belt and couldn't move because of the weight.
##I have this mind that you might do the same thing…
##This fort used to be the forefront base to protect the king's castle from the enemy invading from the sea.
##May be that collapsed pass was a remain of the battle.
##I wanted to go to Madula but you see that pass is closed.
##So I tried to seek another pass, but there's too much hollows around.
##You… you opened that pass? So… I can go to Madula now!?
##I never thought you would solve the problem. I guess you're much reliable then I thought.
##You opened that pass didn't you? Well, thank you so much.
##I was in a big worry because I couldn't go to Madula because of it.
##Oh, sorry. I hadn't even introduced myself.
##I'm Croana the bag craftsman. I repair bags and belts.
##I'm sorry that I can't afford it free, but as a gratitude, I will fix your bag so it will be easier to use.
##Hey, what's the matter?
##Hey!
##What was that for!?
##What is wrong with you!
##Stop being violent!
##I'm not your enemy!
##This does it! Prepare yourself!
##Augh!! Not you again!
##Why do I have to fight with you.
##What do you earn from this?
##I… still had… much more…to do
##Please don't haunt me…
